title: Training in Colab
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I have created a project using the GUI. When I switch to Colab to train, there are no errors but it gets stuck on training. I run deeplabcut.train_network, it loads the config and overwrites max_iters/display_iters/save_iters, it says "Starting training..." and then nothing happens. The cell appears to be running, but nothing else shows up.

### Operating System

Windows 10 Home

### DeepLabCut version

2.2.0.6

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

Colab Pro GPU

### Steps To Reproduce

In Google Colab:

`!pip install deeplabcut
%reload_ext numpy
%reload_ext scipy
%reload_ext matplotlib
%reload_ext mpl_toolkits

!pip install --upgrade scikit-image
!pip3 install pickle5

import deeplabcut
import pickle5 as pickle

from google.colab import drive
drive.mount('/content/drive')

ProjectFolderName = 'TST-AS-2022-03-03'
VideoType = 'mp4'
videofile_path = ['/content/drive/My Drive/DLC/'+ProjectFolderName+'/videos/']
videofile_path
path_config_file = '/content/drive/My Drive/DLC/'+ProjectFolderName+'/config.yaml'
path_config_file

shuffle = 1
deeplabcut.create_training_dataset(path_config_file, net_type='resnet_50', Shuffles=[shuffle], augmenter_type='imgaug', windows2linux=True)

deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file, shuffle=shuffle, displayiters=10,saveiters=50, maxiters=500000, allow_growth=True)`

### Relevant log output


### Anything else?

_No response_
